name: Acceptance Criteria - Services located by Delta, Chorus and TDC prior to commencing works.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Potholing plan to be submitted to Engineer five working days prior to possession of site. Plan to include timing and locations of potholing.
Acceptance Criteria - Engineer accepts potholing plan, potholing of services happens, asbuilts and photos of potholed services.
Frequency - Multiple times at each location
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Temp. Traffic Management to be set up daily before work can commence
Acceptance Criteria - Temp. Traffic Management set up by qualified STMS according to approved plans.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Letters with information related to water shutdowns to be delivered to affected residents by Downer
Acceptance Criteria - Letters to be delivered a minumum of three working days prior to shutdowns
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Letters to be forwarded to Engineer 5 days prior to distribution for approval
Acceptance Criteria - Approved letters distributed to directly affected residents atleast one week prior to works
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - The contractor shall obtain a permit from the Principal in order to take bulk water form the Councils water supply.
Acceptance Criteria - Bulk Water Permit obtained from the Principal
Inspection: By (Role Key) - Downer, Tasman District Council

Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - As-Built drawings shall be completed throughout the construction period as appropriate stages of work are complete,so these can be checked as work proceeds. As build plans are required.
Acceptance Criteria - As-builts are obtained by competent surveyor, loaded onto Auto CAD for plans
Inspection: By (Role Key) - Downer, Town and Country Surveyors
1.8 - Drainage Network and Water Supply Protection
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Drainage network and water supply to be protected and maintained in service prior to works commencing
Acceptance Criteria - Protection in place as per approved EMP

Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - The Contractor shall arrange with the utility operator concerned for the use of such utilities as are required for the purpose of the contract, shall establish accounts, and pay for all such services consumed, and shall reinstate the connections on completion.
Acceptance Criteria - Accounts established with utility providers.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Documents to be reviewed by Engineer and TDC prior to works
Inspection: By (Role Key) - Downer, Tasman District Council, WSP
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Layout to be approved by Engineer prior to installation
Acceptance Criteria - Approved project signs installed at both ends of sites prior to works

Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Removal of all vegetation, trimming of overhanging branches and encroaching shrubs, removal of trees and their root systems to 1.0m clear of any pavement or services construction. Removal and storage of existing signs
